definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Nanguo pear is the special local product of Anshan, Liaoning.
sentences.chinese: 南果梨是辽宁鞍山特产。

sentences.english: There must be a specialty of large peas Fencihu.
sentences.chinese: 其中一定会有奋起湖的特产大碗豆。

sentences.english: Wood carving are a specialty of this village.
sentences.chinese: 雕刻木器是这个村子的特产。

sentences.english: Las Rocas Bar and Grill is the best spot for fresh seafood specialties.
sentences.chinese: 拉斯罗卡斯酒吧和烧烤是新鲜的海鲜特产的最佳位置。

sentences.english: Species are Bar-backed laughing thrush and Three-toed Crowtit in China, their duetting are overlapping type.
sentences.chinese: 其中，斑背噪鹛和三趾鸦雀是中国的特产种。

sentences.english: Tianjin's specialties are battercake, twist dessert.
sentences.chinese: 天津的特产是煎饼和麻花。

sentences.english: Oyster is the most famous specialties of Shenzhen, especially Shajin Oyster.
sentences.chinese: 蚝是深圳最著名的特产，以沙井蚝最为著名。

sentences.english: Shell carvings are a specialty of the town.
There are many specialties in my hometown, tea and fragrans are the most famous.
sentences.chinese: 本人的家乡有很多特产，最有名的是茶叶和木樨。

sentences.english: Thank you also for being interested in Brewster products.
sentences.chinese: 另外也感谢您对布鲁斯特产品的兴趣。

sentences.english: Walnut is a local specialty here.
Folk happy when lunar new year's season jubilation makes the eight-treasure rice pudding edible.
sentences.chinese: 民间喜在年节喜庆时做成八河北有哪些特产宝饭食用。

sentences.english: The Nanguo pear is the specialty of Anshan region and also the main pocketbook of the local farmers.
sentences.chinese: 南果梨是鞍山地区特产，是当地农民的主要经济来源。

sentences.english: The grape is a pure natural, pollution-free specialty precious Changbai Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 所用葡萄是纯天然，无污染的长白山脉珍贵特产。

sentences.english: Cotton is one of the Chaoyang specialty known as "Beyond the Great Yin-hua, " said.
sentences.chinese: 棉花是朝阳的特产之一，素有“塞外银花”之称。

sentences.english: You're sure to see Sacher torte, the local specialty.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要去品尝一下萨克大蛋糕，这是当地的特产。

definition: produced locally/local product (with distinctive native features)
to produce (by natural growth, or by manufacture, mining etc)/to yield/to turn out/produce/products
source (of a product)/place of origin/manufacturing location
to produce in abundance/to be rich in
gift given when visiting sb (esp. a local specialty brought back from one's travels, or a special product of one's own country taken overseas) (Tw)
